name: Multi Truck Transporter 2018
description:
Multi Truck Transporter 2018 lets you become a real trucker! Featuring Many different kinds of trucks construction trucks,European trucks,Japanese trucks etc with lots of different stats, this truck simulator delivers an exciting driving experience that will make you feel like driving real trucks. Travel across many countries from every place,Become the King of The Road by playing Multi truck transporter 2018 !

This game is very interesting game you have to drive heavy vehicles in various multi levels .In Off-road and Busy City.
In this game you will have to play the role of the Truck Driver whose job is to deliver different kinds of cargo i.e transport building material on your construction truck and dump it on the construction site and many other scenarios.

Multi Truck Transporter 2018 Game Features:

- Real Experience of Off road Cargo Truck Driving with the touch of City life.
- Multi level, mission based game
- Amazing 3D Graphics
- Off-road & City Environment
- Pick & Drop to Transport all kinds of cargo
- Thrill of Driving on Hills, Mountains and Steep Paths
